About the Product: Display a vivid and exquisite taste in vogue and entice everyone around you as you hit the streets adorning yourself in these White colored jeans from the house of ANSH FASHION WEAR. Attractive and gorgeous, is what you will look on wearing these Denim Jeans which will surely step up your style quotient and boost up your confidence and personality. Featuring plain finish, these voguish pair of jeans have side and back pockets, concealed zip fly and multiple belt loops. Aesthetically tailored in premium quality blended cotton, these Full-length denims are stretchable and promise a long term endurance. This pair of Regular Fit jeans are itch-free, skin-friendly and provide utmost comfort and breathability, thus keeping you at easy all day long. With intricate stitch detailing, these stylish mid-rise Men jeans are a must have in every men's wardrobe and hence give you a real sassy look. So wait no more and team it up with a bright hued crop-top/stylish shirt - and head out to college, casual parties, get-togethers or day-to-day sprees to fetch tons of admirations for your elegant taste in fashion. Why should you go for these denims? It gives you a fantastic and sassy look Easy to wash and maintain (machine washable) Comfortable and Suitable for everyday use Apt fitting adds more to its value and charm Promises a long term life
